code: export var getHashParams=function getHashParams(hashInput){var hash=hashInput.substring(1);var params={};hash.split('&').map(function(hk){var temp=hk.split('=');params[temp[0]]=temp[1];});return params;};export var getTimeWithMinutesOffset=function getTimeWithMinutesOffset(minutes){return new Date(new Date().getTime()+minutes*60*1000);};
